title: Unexpected Marriage - Novel Updates
tags: Black Belly   Childhood Friends   Contracts   Marriage   Misunderstandings   Short Story   Wealthy Characters
author: 阿阮有酒
description:
A dad with a son (joking)

A school-skipping second generation rich bully is taught a lesson by his man. This is the story of their married life.

Or, alternatively, a handsome father’s (not at all) inability to confess his love.>
